sentences.en: A competitive remuneration package will be offered to successful candidates.
sentences.cn: 我们将为成功的应征者提供优厚的薪资待遇.

sentences.en: But people's contributions do differ . Shouldn't there , therefore , be differences in remuneration?
sentences.cn: 人的贡献不同, 在待遇上是否应当有差别?

sentences.en: Commission means the remuneration paid to an agent.
sentences.cn: 代理酬金指付给代理人的酬金.

sentences.en: Employer's Return of Remuneration and Pensions file of the ABOVE business.
sentences.cn: 上述业务的雇主填报的薪酬及退休金报税表档案.

sentences.en: He object to receiving any remuneration for his service.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝接受任何服务的酬劳.

sentences.en: He received a generous remuneration for his services.
sentences.cn: 他收到一笔丰厚的劳务酬金.

sentences.en: He should pay ITT on the total income from author's remuneration.
sentences.cn: 应按照稿酬所得缴纳个人所得税.

sentences.en: How should Mr. Green file his tax return on income from the author's remuneration?
sentences.cn: 格林先生取得一笔稿费应缴什么税?

sentences.en: I received a yearly remuneration of $ 8 , 000 at the previous work.
sentences.cn: 在以前的工作中,我的年薪为8000美元.

sentences.en: ICLP offers attractive remuneration as well as excellent career development opportunities.
sentences.cn: ICLP为 您提供优厚的待遇和良好的事业发展机会.

sentences.en: In this connection , remuneration in terms of basic pay is not welcome.
sentences.cn: 而且底薪为主的待遇,绝对不受欢迎.

sentences.en: Our manager will talk to you about the remuneration later.
sentences.cn: 稍后,我们的经理会和您谈待遇的问题.

sentences.en: Regarding remuneration, please make a dicision after evaluating my work.
sentences.cn: 关于薪金, 请考验本人的工作后再作定夺.

sentences.en: Tax official: the director fees should be paid according to remuneration.
sentences.cn: 税务局: 董事费按劳务报酬计征.

sentences.en: The living subsidy for senior expert's family is included in the remuneration.
sentences.cn: 报酬已包含高级专家家人的生活补贴.

words.tran_cn: 有利可图的；有报酬的；合算的

phrases.tran_cn: 薪酬福利条件；薪酬利益；酬金方案

trans.tran_en: the pay you give someone for something they have done for you
